title: Tezit Portable Manifest Schema (Portable Tez - Level 2)
description: Minimal JSON Schema for a Tezit Protocol v1.2 manifest.json file at Level 2 (Portable Tez) conformance. Contains only the required fields needed for tool recognition and basic interoperability. Context items are auto-detected from the bundle; an explicit items array is optional but recommended.

tezit_version.description: Tezit Protocol version this manifest conforms to.

id.description: Unique bundle identifier. Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens. Must be 3-100 characters. Must not start or end with a hyphen.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 datetime when the bundle was created.

synthesis.description: Minimal synthesis metadata. At Level 2, only the file path is required.

file.description: Relative path to the synthesis document within the bundle.
